name: Supermarket Grocery Girl - Shopping Fun Kids Games
name_original: Supermarket Grocery Girl - Shopping Fun Kids Games
description:
> Hey Kids! Time to make best shopping in Supermarket with Grocery Girl! SUPER FUN!
> Multiple levels to play! Shopping, Decorate your own shop, Make sure buy some fruits and vegetable to cook food!
> Explore the Whole Supermarket and choose best outfits with your partner for big party!

Have you planned a Big Party? You have no time to make some preparation? Don't worry! Run to the nearest Supermarket to make Shopping! Wonderful! Pregnant mommy wants to make shopping for baby, help her. This is not a ordinary Supermarket. It's a 3D shopping mall game! What you are looking for? Tons of mini games that you would be never play before! Let's Go for the Shopping.

Explore the Cookie section and decorate your own cake and cook food for your guest! It's so much FUN! Play Supermarket Grocery Girl to start shopping in town.

Features:
~Help hungry customer to buy food to make cooking
~Start Shopping with Grocery Girl
~Sort out Fruits and Vegetables and place them in a right place
~Choose a best outfits with your love from supermarket to dressed yourself
~ In cafeteria section, Serve your customers with delicious food
~Explore and decorate shopping mall as you want it
~Share your score via social network

Play & Download "Supermarket Grocery Girl" along with mini games! Don't forget to check out in a cashier store!
